resources.string: NASA Image of the Day Search

Welcome to the NASA Image of the Day Search. To use this, simply use the bottom box to select a date from the popup calendar, then hit search. The app will show you the date selected and the link to that date\'s Image of the Day! You can click the url to open the image and if you love it, you can add it to your favorites! For expert users, you can also type in a date by closing the calendar and typing with the keyboard!
This is the date you select!
What would you like to do with this Favorite?
This is your favorites list! Tap and hold an entry to see more details or remove it from your favorites!
Nothing special to do here! We just wanted to thank you for using our app!
This page will show you the details of one of your favorites and will launch automatically when you use the favorites menu to see more details. No actions required in this page from you!
NASA Image of the Day Search V 1.0
